MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15pm to carry out repair work on our underground cable network, this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.05pm on the 7th of December 2020.
